downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 White Paper: An Introduction to Client Surrogate Keys in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012
downloadDescription: This paper describes how you can use surrogate keys in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, and how to display them in the client.
